title: 7/7 attacks: Names of bombing victims read out during packed St Paul's memorial service
description: A survivor and a victim's daughter read out the names of the 52 people killed at a service to mark the 20th anniversary of the attacks.
content:
'All the things you do stems from what happened on that day'
Katy Prickett
BBC News, Hertfordshire
Image source, Marina Berry-Dealey
"It's taken me 20 years to realise all the things you do, how you think, stems from what happened on that day," says ... [589 chars]
